name: Chris
heading: Product owner, web / ecommerce developer and occasional designer
description: I'm chris, a South African-born entrepreneur and polyglot technologist currently based out of Singapore and Vietnam. I'm the founder of a few companies, some of which have won international awards, one a prestigious technology grant from the Gates Foundation, and others have gone on to raise Private equity, with one looking set to go public in the next few years. I'm currently working on Glue, a bootstrapped digital agency where I spend most of my time building bespoke e-commerce solutions with clients around the world.
